links.title: Meet the electric/autonomous vehicle ETF
links.description: Do you want to bet on electric and autonomous vehicles? Or maybe just bet on too many people betting on electric vehicles? Either way, a new ETF could be of interest. The Global X Autonomous & Electric Vehicles ETF (NASDAQ: DRIV) is being introduced to track the Solactive Autonomous & Electric Vehicles Index.

links.title: iPhone X Alone Generated 35% of the Total Handset Industry Profits in Q4 2017 - Counterpoint Research
links.description: New Delhi, Mumbai, Hong Kong, Seoul, London, Buenos Aires - April 17, 2018 According to the latest research from Counterpoint's Q4 2017, Global handset profits declined 1% YoY in Q4 2017 (October-December) as the premium smartphone market did not grow as expected.

messages.body: $AAPL PUSHES THROUGH PREVIOUS SESSION HIGH: https://techniquant.com/reports/stock-aapl-daily-technical-report-for-2018-04-17/

links.title: AAPL pushes through previous session high
links.description: Highlights Overview Moving higher for the 4th day in a row, AAPL ended Tuesday at 178.24 gaining $2.42 (1.38%) on low volume. Today's closing price of 178.24 marks the highest close since March 15th. The bulls were in full control today, moving the market higher throughout the whole session.
